entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Fort St. John

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -24.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 9:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -24.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -27.8°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
